column4: I'm attempting an install on a Dell N5040 from a live usb.. And I get nothing after passing he bios
Yes, and I did a test boot on both other ubuntu machines in my house
That unit is certified, do you know how to boot with nomodeset? http://www.ubuntu.com/certification/hardware/201104-7783/
If you get it booted make sure you are plugged into the net when installing and tick the downloads box as well.
